system.windows.forms

Class Binding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mases.jcobridge.netreflection.NetObject
      • system.windows.forms.Binding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJCOBridgeReflected

    public class Binding
extends NetObject
    The base .NET class managing System.Windows.Forms.Binding, System.Windows.Forms, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089.

    .NET documentation at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Windows.Forms.Binding

    Powered by JCOBridge: more info at https://www.jcobridge.com

    Author:
    MASES s.r.l https://masesgroup.com
